original_text: by hindering us from speaking to the Gentiles that they might be saved—so as always to fill up the measure of their sins. But wrath has come upon them at last!
korean_text: 우리가 이방인에게 말하여 구원받게 함을 그들이 금하여 자기 죄를 항상 채우매 노하심이 끝까지 그들에게 임하였느니라

sentences.original_text: so as always to fill up the measure of their sins
sentences.korean_translation: 그리하여 항상 그들의 죄를 가득 채우게 함이라

sentences.original_text: But wrath has come upon them
